https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iS5ugNLjEWTKD2I3O0yrfSD6lDj.jpg Is the right way always forward? Is there only one way in life we follow? Do we have a choice on that way? Can we choose our co-passengers? Are we all moving with our own average speed along this way? An Average Speed
